channel.title: Homes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Tech Director Deck Faria Education Group Initiatives for 2021, including ManageBac as an LMS. Learn how teachers are in the driver’s seat to decide how to curate content for their lessons, share out templates, and develop learning experiences with ManageBac’s teaching & learning feature set. Initiatives This space can be what we want to have common throughout all of our presentations? Teachers in the Driver’s Seat Teachers just want to get on with the work, right?
